answers.author: Dominic Mandel
answers.text:
Go to the City of Santa Fe, New Mexico website and look for the business incubator web page. The city funds a similar program that may provide you with support.

author: Ronald Chandler
text: The City I work for has a vacant building in our downtown that we want to use to attract retail businesses.  I am looking for cities that have experience creating retail incubators.  Are there any out there?
title: Retail Incubators
